column2: dplyr::select(year, state, source, "Electric Generators, Electric Utilities") %>%

rename(coal = Coal, geothermal = Geothermal, hydro = `Hydroelectric Conventional`, natgas = `Natural Gas`, nuclear = Nuclear, other = Other, otherbio = `Other Biomass`, othergas = `Other Gases`, pet = Petroleum, pumped = `Pumped Storage`, solar = `Solar Thermal and Photovoltaic`, total = Total, wind = Wind, wood = `Wood and Wood Derived Fuels`) %>%
mutate(total.ren = sum(geothermal, hydro, pumped, solar, wind, wood, otherbio, na.rm= TRUE)) %>%
